resources.string: Welcome to wasteless. Wasteless is an attempt to make the world a better place - not only for the user, but also for the environment. Join us!
Access to the camera is needed for detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Ocr dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage
Choose expiry date, or try to scan it.
Welcome to wasteless - Here, you can scan products, and we will notify you when it is about to expire. You can also see all your products in your inventory, when you have scanned them.
